title: Robert-Jan Bruintjes

summary: We show we can prevent CNNs from exploiting absolute location through image boundary effects.
title: On Translation Invariance in CNNs: Convolutional Layers Can Exploit Absolute Spatial Location

content: Education We provide various courses on computer vision at both the undergraduate and the graduate level. Specifically, we teach courses on Image Processing (B.Sc. level), Computer Vision (M.Sc. level) and Deep Learning (M.Sc. level). In addition, we supervise students at all levels in fundamental and applied research projects, several of which are performed in collaboration with Dutch companies.
